note: Values may exceed 100% when children who are older or younger than the official age group also enroll.
title: Share of girls enrolled in upper secondary school
subtitle: Shown as the [gross enrolment ratio](#dod:gross-enrolment-ratio) â€” the number of girls, regardless of their age, who are enrolled in [upper secondary](#dod:upper-secondary-education) education, expressed as a percentage of girls of upper secondary school age (between 15 and 18 years old).
